feature: Page decorated with lots of photos
description: Photo-rich page results in the screenshots of very large size. PNG becomes bigger than JPEG of the compression quality 1.0. PNG is not suitable for photo-rich pages.
Text-rich page results in the screenshots of small size. PNG becomes smaller than JPEG of the compression quality 1.0. PNG is suitable for text-rich pages.

feature: Usual page. Good mixture of texts and images
description: In this case, PNG has similar file size as JPEG of the compression quality 1.0. You can compress JPEG; it's an advantage.
